title: Commemorating the 15th Anniversary of Joloff Restaurant
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commemorating  the  15th  Anniversary of Joloff
Restaurant to be celebrated on Friday, July 23, 2010

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize the mile-
stones of those illustrious culinary establishments which have positive-
ly impacted and substantially  contributed  to  the  vitality  of  their
communities; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly  proud  to  commem-
orate  the  15th  Anniversary  of Joloff Restaurant, to be celebrated on
Friday, July 23, 2010, in Brooklyn, New York; and
  WHEREAS, Joloff is a West African  restaurant  specializing  in  Sene-
galese  cuisine;  its  most popular dish is the Senegalese national dish
called Tiebou Jeun (baked fish, joloff rice and veggies); and
  WHEREAS, Another one of Joloff's specialties is  its  homemade  juices
which  are all freshly made; the restaurant is one of the few West Afri-
can restaurants serving primarily vegetarian  food;  in  addition,  they
serve vegan food; and
  WHEREAS, Originally, the recipes were developed in order to feed owner
Papa  Diagne's  Rastafarian  friends, who were vegetarians, and he later
realized that there was an even greater  need  for  vegetarian  food  in
Brooklyn;  since  1995, Joloff Restaurant has been visited regularly not
only by the local community, but also by a number of celebrities; and
  WHEREAS, Some of those celebrities who have been  regulars  at  Joloff
include:  Sizzla,  AKON,  Talib  Kweli,  Mos Def, Erykah Badu, M1, Kevin
Powel and Isac Debancole; the restaurant was featured in the DAILY NEWS,
THE NEW YORK TIMES, the NEW YORK AMSTERDAM NEWS, in Eat and OCSNews; and
  WHEREAS, Papa Diagne feels that his restaurant  helps  many  different
people discover not just the food but also the Senegalese way of living,
along with the culture; and
  WHEREAS, It is with great pleasure that this Legislative Body acknowl-
edges  the  success of this exceptional restaurant, fully confident that
it will continue to enjoy the sparkling success it has experienced  thus
far; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commemorate the 15th Anniversary of Joloff Restaurant; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Papa Diagne, Owner, Joloff Restaurant.
